1010.SR.summary: Riyad Bank provides various banking products and services in the Kingdom Of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Retail Banking, Investment Banking and Brokerage, Corporate Banking, and Treasury and Investments segments. The Retail Banking segment offers deposits, credit, and investment products for individuals and small to medium sized businesses. The Investment Banking and Brokerage segment provides investment management services; and asset management services related to dealing, managing, arranging, advising, and custody of securities. The Corporate Banking segment provides current accounts, deposits, loans, overdrafts and other credit facilities, and derivative products for corporate customers. The Treasury and Investments segment offers money market, trading, and treasury services, as well as manages investment portfolios. The company also provides Islamic banking products and services. It operates through a network of approximately 341 branches in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia; a branch in London, the United Kingdom; an agency in Houston, the United States; and a representative office in Singapore. Riyad Bank was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom Of Saudi Arabia.

1020.SR.summary: Bank AlJazira provides a range of Shari'ah compliant banking products and services for individuals, corporates, small to medium sized businesses, and institutions in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Treasury, Brokerage and Asset Management, and Takaful Ta'awuni segments. It offers various personal banking products and services, including various current accounts; credit cards; real estate and personal financing services; safety deposits; money transfer, and mobile point of sale services; savings and investment products; and ladies and e-banking services. The company also provides Islamic funding services; global transaction services, such as cash management, trade financing, and corporate payroll services; syndication financing services; and commercial and online banking services, as well as services for public sector and financial institutions. In addition, it offers investment banking services comprising brokerage and asset management services, as well as corporate financing services through initial public offerings, private placement, capital increase, and underwriting. Further, the company provides private banking products and services, including ATM and credit cards, safe deposit lockers, trading commission, foreign currency exchange, short term deposits, and structured products; real-estates investments; wealth management services; and treasury services, including naqa'a and thrift saving programs, foreign exchange, FX forward, structured products, and hedging solutions, as well as margin financing services. As of 31 December, 2019, it operated a network of 78 branches and 61 Fawri remittance centers. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1050.SR.summary: Banque Saudi Fransi provides banking and financial services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, Treasury, and Investment Banking and Brokerage segments. Its deposit products include demand accounts, saving accounts, current accounts, money market deposits, term deposits, and notice deposits, as well as mada Pay and Apple Pay products. The company's loan portfolio comprises home and personal loans, consumer loans, overdrafts, corporate finance, working capital finance, contract finance, structured finance, trade finance, Islamic finance, project finance, and credit and debit cards, as well as other credit facilities. It also provides forex and derivative products; auto leasing services; treasury services, such as trading activities, investment securities, money market, and bank's funding operations; and cash and wealth management services. In addition, the company provides investment management services; asset management activities related to dealing, managing, arranging, advising, and custody of securities; retail investment products; international and local shares brokerage services; education, retirement, travel protection, and car protection insurance plans; and ATM, and Islamic and e-banking services. It operates through a network of 87 branches. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1090.SR.summary: Samba Financial Group provides various banking products and services. The company operates through four segments: Consumer Banking, Corporate Banking, Treasury, and Investment Banking. The Consumer Banking segment offers individual customer time deposits, current, call, and savings accounts, as well as credit cards, retail investment products, and individual and consumer loans. The Corporate Banking segment provides corporate time deposits, current and call accounts, overdrafts, loans and other credit facilities, and corporate advisory services, as well as derivative portfolios. The Treasury segment primarily manages money market, foreign exchange, commission rate trading, and derivatives for corporate and institutional customers. The Investment Banking segment is involved in the investment management and asset management activities related to dealing, managing, arranging, advising, and custody businesses. The company also offers Islamic banking products, as well as manages real estate projects; and provides debit cards and online banking services. It operates 73 branches in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia; and two overseas branches. Samba Financial Group was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1120.SR.long_name: Al Rajhi Banking and Investment Corporation
1120.SR.summary: Al Rajhi Banking and Investment Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in banking and investment activities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Retail, Corporate, Treasury, and Investment Services and Brokerage. It offers current, affluent, private, and ladies accounts; personal, car, and home finance services; credit and debit cards; and motor, family protection, medical, home, personal accident, travel insurance, marine and cargo, engineering, machinery breakdown, property, and liability insurance products. The company also provides documentary collection, letters of credit, letters of guarantee, supply chain finance, and e-trade services; cash management services; and small and medium enterprise banking products and services, as well as mobile and online banking services. In addition, it offers various corporate products, such as Bai Al Ajel, a financing facility that provides cash to customers; Murabaha contracts that allow customers to purchase raw materials, capital goods, and other consumables from local and international markets; Musharaka that enables customers to import goods and equipment; Istisnaa for financing real estate projects; Akar for investing in properties; and Erad that provides credit facilities against the assignment of rental income for a specific period for those interested in financing a real estate purchase. Further, the company provides treasury products, including direct investment, foreign exchange, and banknotes; and mutual funds, investment, and local and international share trading services. It operates 572 branches. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1140.SR.summary: Bank Albilad provides various banking products and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, Treasury, and Investment Banking and Brokerage segments. The Retail Banking segment offers deposits, financing, remittances, and currency exchange products and services to individuals. The Corporate Banking segment provides deposits, financing, and trade services to corporate customers. The Treasury segment offers money market and treasury services. The Investment Banking and Brokerage segment offers investment management services; and undertakes asset management activities related to dealing, managing, arranging, advising, and custody of securities. It also provides payroll payment and vendor registration services; and debit, credit, medad, and household labor cards, as well as e-services. It operates through a network of 110 banking branches and 179 exchange and remittance centers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1150.SR.summary: Alinma Bank provides banking and investment services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, Treasury, and Investment and Brokerage segments. The company provides various retail services, including current, family, education, savings, investment, and Sadad accounts; self-service banking; cards; car, real estate, personal, self-construction finance, and education financing; exemplary services; and private banking services. It also offers treasury, letters of guarantee, documentary collection, documentary letters of credit, and guarantee verification services; cash management services; corporate partner services; finance and investment products; financial services to small and medium enterprises (SMEs); and payroll management and point of sale services. In addition, the company provides investment management, asset management, custodianship, advisory, underwriting, and brokerage services; and operates as an insurance agent. Alinma Bank offers its services to individuals, corporates, SMEs, and institutional customers. As of December 31, 2019, the company served through its network of 95 branches. Alinma Bank was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1182.SR.long_name: Amlak International for Real Estate Finance Company
1182.SR.summary: Amlak International for Real Estate Finance Company engages in the real estate financing business in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Retail and Corporate segments. It serves high net worth, and small and medium sized businesses and individuals, as well as corporate and institutional customers. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

2140.SR.summary: Ayyan Investment Company engages in the construction of non-residential buildings in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. Its non-residential business includes schools, hospital, hotels, etc. The company also establishes and operates health, education, tourism, and agricultural facilities; and establishes cold storage facilities, transport fleets, and gas stations. In addition, it maintains, manages, and operates industrial and residential properties, as well as hospitals, clinics, and medical centers; owns lands; and invests in real estate properties and securities. The company was formerly known as Al Ahsa Development Company and changed its name to Ayyan Investment Company in July 2020. Ayyan Investment Company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Al Khobar, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

4331.SR.summary: Al - Jazira Mawten REIT Fund is a real estate investment trust managed by Al Jazira Capital Company, Asset Management Arm. The firm invests real estate markets of Saudi Arabia. It invests in income-generating property developments. The firm investments are mainly focused on the Jeddah-based Al-Khumra warehouses, which are wholly owned by AlJazira Mawten real estate income fund. Al - Jazira Mawten REIT Fund is based in Saudi Arabia.

8012.SR.summary: Aljazira Takaful Taawuni Company provides various insurance products and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The Company's Individual segment offers life insurance products, which include unit linked investment oriented products on an individual basis. Its Group segment provides life protection programs to the members of organizations on a group basis, as well as credit protection benefits in respect of personal loan given by financing organization. This segment also includes protection benefits in respect of various credit facilities other than personal loans extended by the financing organizations to its customers. Aljazira Takaful Taawuni Company is based in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8020.SR.summary: Malath Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance products and related services to individuals and businesses in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Property, Engineering, Motor, Medical, and Others segments. It offers fire and property insurance; engineering insurance that provides coverage for builders' risks, construction, mechanical, electrical, electronic, and machinery breakdown; marine hull and cargo; travel and medical malpractice; and motor, health, and miscellaneous accident insurance products. The company also provides risk management, insurance consultation, and reinsurance services. Malath Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8040.SR.long_name: Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company
8040.SR.summary: Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance products to corporate and individual customers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers motor, travel, personal accident, marine, health, engineering, property and casualty, employee benefits, credit, liability, fidelity guarantee, comprehensive crime, D&O, and protection and savings insurance. The company was formerly known as Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company and changed its name to Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company in October 2010. Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8050.SR.summary: Salama Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance products and services in the United Arab Emirates, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Algeria, Malaysia, Bahrain, Senegal, and Egypt. It operates through three segments: Medical, Motor, and Others. It offers motor insurance products that cover accident, fire, towing, malicious, theft, estimation, and medical expenses; and medical insurance for care, medicines, chronic diseases, vaccination, maternity and neonatal, physiotherapy, ophthalmology, dental care, oncology, and CCHI. The company also provides travel insurance comprising personal accidents, medical expenses, repatriation of mortal remains, lost baggage, passport loss, cash loss, personal liability, and accidental death; and malpractice insurance that provides specialties, flexible, and medical facilities coverage. In addition, it offers general insurance coverage, such as engineering, liability, marine, property, and general accident insurance products. The company was formerly known as Saudi IAIC Cooperative Insurance Company and changed its name to Salama Cooperative Insurance Company in 2012. Salama Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8060.SR.summary: Walaa Cooperative Insurance Company provides various insurance products and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers various property insurance products, including property all risk, fire and perils, home, and loss of profit/business interruption insurance; and engineering insurance products, such as erection all risk, contractors all risk, electronic equipment, and contractor's plant and machinery/equipment insurance, as well as machinery breakdown insurance (MBD), loss of profit following MBD, and deterioration of stock following MBD. The company also provides motor insurance products, which include commercial and private motor comprehensive, and third party liability policies; marine insurance products, including marine cargo and hull insurance policies; medical insurance; and miscellaneous accidents insurance products, such as fidelity guarantee, money, personal accident, workmen's compensation and employers liability, travel, medical malpractice, and public and product liability insurance, as well as offers reinsurance products and services. The company was formerly known as Saudi United Cooperative Insurance Company and changed its name to Walaa Cooperative Insurance Company in May 2017. Walaa Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Al-Khobar, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8080.SR.summary: SABB Takaful Company provides takaful insurance plans to personal and business customers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates through three segments: Individual Family Takaful, Group Family Takaful, and General Takaful. The company offers various protection plans, including travel, home, and personal accident takaful products; and wealth management plans consisting of investment, saving, education, and retirement takaful products. It also provides business protection products comprising marine cargo, business interruption or loss of profit, public liability, keyman protection, fire-property all risks, group creditors, SME package, fidelity guarantee, and money takaful plans; and employee benefits products, including group personal accident and care plans. The company is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8100.SR.summary: Saudi Arabian Cooperative Insurance Company provides various insurance products in Saudi Arabia. The company provides group medical, automotive, marine cargo, engineering, hull, property, liability, and group life, insurance products. The company also sells its products online. It serves corporates, SMEs, and individuals. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

8110.SR.long_name: Saudi Indian Company for Cooperative Insurance Wafa Insurance
8110.SR.summary: Saudi Indian Company for Cooperative Insurance Wafa Insurance provides general insurance, health insurance, and protection and savings products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Motor, Health, and Other segments. It offers property, accident, and liability insurance comprising fire, property damage, business interruption, personal accident, fidelity, money, theft and burglary, comprehensive general liability, workmen's compensation, medical malpractice, and medical insurance products; comprehensive and third party motor insurance products; and marine cargo insurance products. The company's products also include engineering insurance, such as machinery breakdown, contractor's all risk, contractor's plant and machinery, erection all risks, and electronics equipment insurance products; medical insurance; individual protection and saving products; and individual and group protection plans, as well as a range of reinsurance products and services. Saudi Indian Company for Cooperative Insurance Wafa Insurance is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8120.SR.long_name: Gulf Union Alahlia Cooperative Insurance Company
8120.SR.summary: Gulf Union Alahlia Cooperative Insurance Company provides various insurance products and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers commercial products, such as third party liability insurance for private cars, commercial vehicles, and diplomatic cars, as well as insurance for accidental and malicious damages to the insured car; medical, property, and marine cargo and hull insurance; engineering insurance that covers machinery breakdown, electronic equipment, stock deterioration, contractor's plant and equipment, and contractors/erection risks; general accident insurance products, such as burglary, general and employers liability, fidelity guarantee, money, personal accident, public liability, public and products liability, and workmen's compensation insurance; and group life insurance that covers death, accidental death, permanent total and partial disability, and medical and repatriation expenses. It also provides individual products, such as Auto Insurance, and medical and health insurance. Gulf Union Alahlia Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Dammam, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8130.SR.summary: AlAhli Takaful Company provides protection and saving insurance products through insurance solutions for individuals and groups in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through two segments, Insurance-Individual and Insurance-Group Life. The Insurance-Individual segment offers life insurance products on an individual basis, including unit linked investment oriented products. The Insurance-Group Life segment provides life protection programs to the members of organizations on a group basis; and credit's protection benefits in respect of personal loan given by financing organisation. This segment also offers protection benefits in respect of various credit facilities other than personal loans extended by the financing organisationsto its customers. AlAhli Takaful Company was founded in 2007 and is based in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8170.SR.summary: Al-Etihad Cooperative Insurance Co. provides insurance services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers property and casualty, motor, marine and marine cargo, medical and health, general accident and liability, and engineering and construction solutions. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Al-Khobar, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8180.SR.summary: Al Sagr Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance products and solutions in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Singapore. The company operates through Medical, Motor, Property and Casualty, and Protection and Savings segments. It offers fire and allied perils, property all risks, and business interruption insurance products; marine cargo and hull insurance products; and engineering insurance products comprising contractor's all risks and erection all risks, contractors' plant and machinery, machinery breakdown, loss of profit due to machinery breakdown, boiler and pressure vessels, deterioration of stock, and electronics equipment insurance. The company also provides liability insurance products, such as workmen's compensation, employer liability, public liability, and professional indemnity insurance; onshore and offshore energy insurance products; and medical, travel, motor, and medical malpractice insurance products. In addition, it offers miscellaneous insurance products, including personal accident, money, fidelity guarantee, and burglary insurance. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Dammam, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8210.SR.long_name: Bupa Arabia for Cooperative Insurance Company
8210.SR.summary: Bupa Arabia for Cooperative Insurance Company underwrites medical insurance products for corporations and individuals primarily in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It issues short-term insurance contracts for providing health care services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8230.SR.long_name: Al Rajhi Company for Cooperative Insurance
8230.SR.summary: Al Rajhi Company for Cooperative Insurance provides various insurance products and services to individuals and corporates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates in four segments: General, Motor, Health, and Protection and Savings. It offers motor, medical, unified health, medical malpractice, visitor visa, travel, personal accident, home owners, liability, contractors, marine, fire, engineering, casualty, construction plant, machinery breakdown, and erection all risk insurance; and protection and savings products, such as education, marriage, retirement, and investment insurance. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8240.SR.summary: Chubb Arabia Cooperative Insurance Company operates as a multiline property and casualty insurer in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers property and casualty insurance products comprising property all risks, fire and allied perils, business interruption, householders', terrorism and sabotage, burglary and housebreaking, general liability, workmen's compensation and employer's liability, motor, plate glass, money, crime, fidelity guarantee/employee dishonesty, and travel insurance products. It also provides engineering insurance products comprising contractors all risk, erection all risks, machinery breakdown, business interruption due to machinery breakdown, and computer/electronic data processing, as well as machinery, plant, and equipment all risks insurance products. In addition, the company offers marine cargo, project cargo and DSU, inland transit, and marine hull insurance products; group life and group personal accident insurance products; and financial insurance products, such as bankers blanket bond, financial institutions professional indemnity, civil liability for financial institutions, electronic and computer crime, fraud protector, financial services industry insurance policy, and directors and officers liability insurance. It serves multinational corporations and local businesses, companies, and affinity groups. Chubb Arabia Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Al Khobar, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8270.SR.summary: Buruj Cooperative Insurance Company provides various general insurance products to individuals and business entities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through five segments: Motor Insurance, Medical Products, Property, Marine Products, and Others. The company underwrites motor comprehensive, motor compulsory third party liability, property, accidental damage, property all risks, marine cargo single shipment and open cover, marine land transit open cover, public liability, personal accident, fidelity guarantee, money, term life, and contractors' and erection all risks insurance products, as well as offers health care cover policies. It also provides workers' compensation, machinery, machinery loss of profits, deterioration of cold storage, loss of profit following machinery breakdown, electronic equipment, and boiler and pressure vessels insurance products. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8280.SR.long_name: Al Alamiya for Cooperative Insurance Company
8280.SR.summary: Al Alamiya for Cooperative Insurance Company engages in the insurance and reinsurance businesses primarily in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through six segments: Property, Motor, Engineering, Medical, Marine, Group Life, and Others. It offers personal insurance products, including home, motor, personal accident, travel, and yacht and pleasure craft insurance products; commercial insurance products, such as material damage and business interruption, workmen's compensation, public and product liability, marine, medical, and employee dishonesty and money insurance products; and risk management and claims services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Al Alamiya for Cooperative Insurance Company is a subsidiary of Royal & Sun Alliance Insurance (Middle East) BSC (c).

8290.SR.summary: Solidarity Saudi Takaful Company provides various insurance products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers motor, travel, householder, medical malpractice, medical, property, marine, aviation liability, engineering, accident and liability, and group life takaful insurance products. Solidarity Saudi Takaful Company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8300.SR.summary: Wataniya Insurance Company provides a range of insurance products and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates through Marine, Property, Motor, Engineering, Accident & Liability, Extended Warranty, and Term Life segments. The company offers various insurance products, such as motor insurance; and general accident and casualty insurance products, including fidelity guarantee, money, personal accident, public liability, work injury, medical malpractice, burglary, glass breakage, and travel insurance. It also provides marine cargo insurance products, which include land transit, marine cargo, and marine hull insurance; employee benefits insurance; and engineering insurance products comprising contractor all risk, contractors' plant and machinery, electronic equipment, erection all risk, machinery breakdown, and deterioration of stock insurance. In addition, the company offers property insurance products comprising property all risk, fire and lightning, household comprehensive, and terrorism risk insurance; extended warranty coverage against damages to motor vehicles; and term life coverage against the insured's death. Wataniya Insurance Company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8311.SR.summary: Saudi Enaya Cooperative Insurance Company operates as a health insurance company in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It underwrites medical insurance products for group and individual clients. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8312.SR.summary: Alinma Tokio Marine Company provides various insurance products and services to individuals and corporates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Property and Casualty, Motor, Protection and Savings, and Medical segments. It offers protection and savings programs; motor insurance; and fidelity guarantee, commercial general liability, trade credit, personal accident, money, bankers blanket bond, hauliers and public liability, and workers compensation insurance products. The company also provides business interruption, fire and special perils, home package, and property all risk insurance products; health insurance; marine cargo and cargo voyage risks insurance products; and boiler and pressure vessel, contractor's all risk, contractors' plant and machinery insurance, deterioration of stock in cold storage, electronic equipment, erection all risks, loss of profits following machinery breakdown, and machinery insurance. Alinma Tokio Marine Company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
